name: tm90
effect: Teaches Substitute to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Substitute to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
flavor_text.platinum: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
